item.title: With a Letter From King Charles, Starmer Was Welcomed Into Trump’s Court
item.description: The British prime minister, Keir Starmer, presented President Trump with a royal invitation and scored several political wins. But his top goal — a se...

item.title: U.S. Terminates Funding for Polio, H.I.V., Malaria and Nutrition Programs Around the World
item.description: Here are some of the 5,800 contracts the Trump administration formally canceled this week in a wave of terse emails.

item.title: Why ‘Emilia Pérez,’ a Film About Mexico, Flopped in Mexico
item.description: The polarizing movie is up for 13 Academy Awards on Sunday. But in Mexico, it has been widely criticized for its depiction of the country.

item.title: No Trains, No Planes, and Huge Protests: Strike Brings Greece to a Halt
item.description: Two years after the country’s deadliest rail disaster, many are still demanding greater safety and accountability.

item.title: Vietnamese Journalist Gets 2 ½ Years in Prison for Facebook Posts
item.description: The sentence for Truong Huy San, an influential reporter, was the latest crackdown on speech by Vietnam, a rising regional power.
